column1: #Text=Aang says : " I told the general I 'd help him , by going into the Avatar State . "
#Text=Remember when he took out the Fire Navy ?
#Text=" Katara says : " There 's a right way to do this .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Or just glow it up and stop that Fire Lord !
#Text=" Katara says : " If you two meat heads want to throw away everything we 've worked for , fine , go ahead and glow it up !
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara , I 'm just being realistic !
#Text=I do n't have time to do this the right way !
